Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: The Ai that I have used in the past was a couple years old, therefore didn't have enough relevant information to critically analyse my work properly, whereas my teacher/tutor was able to give 'human' feedback on what they are/were looking for, what specific parts could be updated and/or changed, and what needs to be looked into further/expanded on.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Sometimes the feedback I was given from teachers/tutors was given in a round-about way, not specifically addressing the thing I wanted feedback on, whereas if I asked Ai a specific question, whether it was relevant information or not, it would give specific feedback on what I wanted. (Ignoring that most of the time it was not correct information due to the differences in assignment guidelines around the country.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: I was given current examples from some teachers/tutors that were/are similar to my work, while Ai just gave me dot points on what should be included.
